title: Basics of Printing in C
concept: In this level you will learn the basic structure of a C program and how to print text using the printf() function. You will also practice escape characters, newline output and formatting. No input processing is required in most problems here.

challenges.title: Hello, C!
Welcome Message
Print With Quotes
New Line Practice
challenges.description: Print Hello and World on two separate lines.

challenges.title: Hello <name>
challenges.description: Read a single word and print: Hello <name>

challenges.title: Print Two Words
challenges.description: Read two strings and print them separated by a space.
challenges.inputDescription: Two words separated by a space.
examples:
Input:
Hello World

Output:
Hello World

challenges.title: Print the Number
challenges.description: Read an integer and print: You entered: <number>

challenges.title: Sum Message
challenges.description: Read two integers and print: Sum = <total>
challenges.inputDescription: Two integers separated by a space.

challenges.title: A B C
Text Box
